entity_inputs.name: Human
entity_inputs.entity_description: A realistic human being with a unique personality and background

dimensions.name: nationality
dimensions.description: The country of origin for this person

dimensions.name: hobby
dimensions.description: This person's favorite hobby or pastime

dimensions.name: age
dimensions.description: The age of this person in years

dimensions.name: is_employed
dimensions.description: Whether this person currently has a job

output_fields.name: personality
output_fields.description: The key personality traits that define this person's character

output_fields.name: pet
output_fields.description: This person's pet, if they have one (including type, name, and brief description)

output_fields.name: favorite_quote
output_fields.description: A quote or saying that this person lives by or often repeats

entity_inputs.name: Fantasy Character
entity_inputs.entity_description: A fictional character from a fantasy world

dimensions.name: race
dimensions.description: The fantasy species or race of this character

dimensions.name: age
dimensions.description: The age of this character in years

dimensions.name: is_magical
dimensions.description: Whether this character can use magic

output_fields.name: abilities
output_fields.description: Special abilities, powers, or skills this character possesses

output_fields.name: weapon
output_fields.description: The character's primary weapon or magical implement

output_fields.name: quest
output_fields.description: The current quest or mission this character is pursuing
